translation.en: Mom says we have to be polite to her dates...
translation.fr: Maman veut qu'on soit polis avec ses copains. D'accord.

translation.en: ...and we will if he makes it to the door.
translation.fr: Maman veut qu'on soit polis avec ses copains. D'accord. S'il atteint la porte.

translation.en: -Merry Christmas, sucker. -And don't come back for Kwanzaa.
translation.fr: Joyeux Noël, crétin ! Reviens pas pour Mardi gras !

translation.en: Think you're going out with our mama?
translation.fr: Tu sortiras pas avec notre mère !

translation.en: I'm gonna get you two.
Get me out of here!
Lindsey, you really think Dad's coming back?
Any day now. But until then, we have to keep Mom available.
translation.fr: Bientôt. Mais faut que maman reste libre.

translation.en: Problem is, she's just too pretty.
That just makes our job a whole lot tougher.
Sometimes I feel sorry for her.
translation.fr: Parfois, elle me fait de la peine.

translation.en: Well, I feel sorry for the next sucker who tries to put the moves on her.
translation.fr: J'ai de la peine pour le prochain naze qui va la draguer.

translation.en: -Mr. Persons. -My man.
translation.fr: Monsieur Persons. Mon pote, t'as ce qui faut ?

translation.en: What you got for me?
translation.fr: Mon pote, t'as ce qui faut ?

translation.en: -I'll get the door for you. -Got that new-car smell, you know?
This puppy's missing one thing.
Welcome to the big leagues, Satch. Let's make it happen.
translation.fr: Bienvenue en 1re division, Satch. En voiture !

translation.en: Look at this ride. Parchment leather with the satin nickel trim.
translation.fr: Un vrai carrosse ! Intérieur cuir parchemin, satiné.

translation.en: Look out, ladies, here we come. Holla.
Nick Persons. How's it going, man?
How's it look?
Keep driving, fool. That's the one that sicced her dog on you.
translation.fr: T'es cinglé, avance. Elle a déjà lâché son chien sur toi.

translation.en: What? You want some of this, huh? You want a piece of me?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que t'as ? Tu veux te battre ?

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. Six thousand pounds of respect.
translation.fr: Doux Jésus ! 3 tonnes de pur respect.

translation.en: -Yeah. It's nice, huh? -Yeah.
-Take it for a spin? -Yeah.
I don't think so.
-Man, what did that unit set you back? -I got a good deal on it.
translation.fr: Tu l'as payée combien ? J'ai eu un bon prix.

translation.en: Right. Your payments probably cost more than my car.
translation.fr: Une échéance vaut plus que ma voiture.

translation.en: Marty, my shoes cost more than your car.
translation.fr: Mes pompes valent plus que ta voiture.

translation.en: Look, Nick, here come your favorite customers.
-Hey, mister, you got any Yu-Gi-Oh? -What you think?
You got any Dragon Ball GT?
Look, you come in here every day asking the same questions.
translation.fr: Vous demandez ça tous les jours.

translation.en: We ain't got no Pokémon, no Digimon, no Buffy, no SpongeBob...
translation.fr: On n'a pas ni Pokémon, Digimon, Buffy,

translation.en: ...no Beanie Babies and no shoplifters.
translation.fr: Bob l'Eponge, Beanie Babies, ni voleurs !

translation.en: Now, get! Both of y'all, get!
You better get. You better get out of here.
-You got a way with kids. -They're like cockroaches...
translation.fr: T'as le truc, avec les gosses. Ce sont des cafards qu'on peut pas écraser.

translation.en: ...except you can't squish them.
translation.fr: Ce sont des cafards qu'on peut pas écraser.

translation.en: -You gonna clean that? -I don't do windows.
translation.fr: Tu nettoies ? Je suis pas laveur de carreaux.

translation.en: What? It'll dry.
People wanna know why I hate kids.
translation.fr: Pas étonnant que je déteste les gosses.

translation.en: What's the matter with you?
-I think I'm in love. -Love? No....
What do you mean, love?
Oh, yeah, that's the new girl from the party-planning place. Yikes.
translation.fr: Nouvelle recrue, dans la boîte d'événementiels. Canon.

translation.en: -She's so fine. -Yeah.
-Man, I got to get with that. -Whoa, whoa.
She's a divorcée, man. That's way too much baggage for a guy like you.
translation.fr: Elle est divorcée. Trop lourd pour Nick l'Esquive.

translation.en: Don't be so quick to judge people, man.
translation.fr: Ne juge pas à la va-vite.

translation.en: This isn't the Nick the Quick that I know.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas mon Nick l'Esquive.

translation.en: -Hey, I had broccoli yesterday. -So?
translation.fr: - J'ai mangé des brocolis. - Et alors ?

translation.en: Sometimes you got to try something new, my friend. Look and learn.
translation.fr: Parfois, il faut tenter de nouvelles expériences.

translation.en: -What happened? -Oh, man, she's a breeder. Two of them.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Une reproductrice. Elle en a 2.

translation.en: Hey, wait!
Do you have any jumper cables?
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'un câble de démarrage !

translation.en: Hey, Nick, don't do this.
She's got two kids and a broken-down car.
translation.fr: Elle a 2 gosses et une voiture en rade.

translation.en: What's next? You gonna ask her mama to move in with us?
translation.fr: Tu vas aussi proposer d'héberger sa mère ?

translation.en: Oh, I'm so happy to see you. I've been standing out here forever.
translation.fr: Quel soulagement ! Je suis coincée ici depuis des heures.

translation.en: This might not be a good idea, because we got rain, electricity.
translation.fr: Ce n'est peut-être pas une bonne idée. La pluie, l'électricité...

translation.en: Oh, but I sure do appreciate it.
You know, you look so familiar.
Have we met before?
Well, I'm Nick. I work right across the street from you.
translation.fr: Nick. Je travaille en face de votre bureau.

translation.en: Oh, that's right. You're the guy that owns that cute little toy store.
translation.fr: Vous tenez cette adorable boutique de jouets.

translation.en: Fine sports collectibles.
I'll hook this up for you.
I think my car hates me.
Oh, but, Nick, this is a nice ride.
-Oh, you like this, huh? -Yeah.
You know, look. It even heats the undercarriage.
translation.fr: On peut même se réchauffer le châssis.

translation.en: I like it.
"I like it."
Remember the score: one player, two kids and--
translation.fr: Rappel : Un canon, deux boulets, et...

translation.en: Holy moly!
Oh, that is so cool. That's a Satchel Paige bobblehead.
translation.fr: C'est trop génial ! C'est Satchel Paige !

translation.en: That's when he played for the Monarchs.
What? A woman that knows a little something about Satchel?
translation.fr: Une femme qui a déjà entendu parler de Satchel ?

translation.en: He was my daddy's idol. He pitched for five decades...
translation.fr: C'était l'idole de mon père. 50 ans de carrière.

translation.en: ...including three shutout innings for the Royals at the age of 59.
translation.fr: Trois manches blanches avec les Royals, à 59 ans.

translation.en: Well, you know, my man Satch used to have a saying:
translation.fr: Mon pote Satch avait un dicton :

translation.en: "Age is a question of mind over matter.
translation.fr: On a l'âge de sa tête, pas de ses jambes.

translation.en: If you don't mind, it don't matter."
translation.fr: Si ça te fait une belle jambe, c'est pas un casse-tête.

translation.en: You know that?
Hubba-hubba. Now, that's a woman.
translation.fr: Hubba Hubba ! Ça, c'est de la gonzesse !

translation.en: Plenty of smarts, easy on the eyes, and can quote my stats.
translation.fr: Pleine d'esprit, bonne à mater et capable de me citer.

translation.en: I don't care if she got 100 kids. I like her.
translation.fr: Oubliée, sa tonne de gosses. Elle me plaît !

translation.en: All we gotta do is lose the small fries.
Now, I'm not saying drop them in the shark tank. No.
translation.fr: Je ne dis pas de les balancer aux requins.

translation.en: But there's nothing kids like more than military school.
translation.fr: Les gosses rêvent d'aller dans une école militaire.

translation.en: Out of sight, out of mind.
translation.fr: Loin des yeux, loin du cœur.

translation.en: Excuse me?
I don't mind. -If you need a lift, I'll give you a ride. -Oh, okay.
translation.fr: Si le cœur vous en dit, je vous dépose.

translation.en: Smooth, Nick. Here's how I think that we gonna make our move.
translation.fr: Bien joué. Ecoute comment on va manœuvrer.

translation.en: Pretend like you gonna help her with her seat belt...
translation.fr: Approche pour l'aider à attacher sa ceinture.

translation.en: ...then with your free hand, put your arm around her shoulder and-- Hey!
Let me out! How am I gonna wave you home if I can't see the play?
translation.fr: Libère-moi ! Je peux pas t'aider à marquer si je vois pas l'action.

translation.en: I'm a hall-of-famer. How about showing some respect?
translation.fr: Je suis une légende. Un peu de respect !

translation.en: And that's my story. What about you, Nick? Are you local?
translation.fr: Vous connaissez ma vie. Et vous, vous êtes de la région ?

translation.en: -Black man from Oregon? -Right.
translation.fr: Un Black, de l'Oregon ? C'est vrai.

translation.en: No. I'm from St. Louis.
I actually moved out here to play Triple-A ball with the Beavers...
translation.fr: Je suis venu pour intégrer l'équipe de base-ball des Beavers.

translation.en: ...but ended up hurting my shoulder, and it kind of ended my career.
translation.fr: Une blessure à l'épaule a mis fin à ma carrière.

translation.en: Oh, you threw your arm out pitching.
translation.fr: Vous vous êtes blessé en lançant ?

translation.en: Well, not exactly.
I tore my rotator cuff lifting my big-screen TV out of a U-Haul.
translation.fr: Je me suis déchiré les rotateurs en déménageant ma télé.

translation.en: -That's really sad. -I know.
translation.fr: C'est trop triste. Heureusement, on assure les sportifs pour ces bêtises.

translation.en: Good thing there's athlete's insurance, in case you do something stupid.
translation.fr: Heureusement, on assure les sportifs pour ces bêtises.

translation.en: So, you know, I was wondering...
translation.fr: Je me demandais si ça vous dirait...

translation.en: ...if maybe you'd consider-- If you wasn't busy--
translation.fr: Je me demandais si ça vous dirait... si vous avez du temps...

translation.en: -What is going on out here? -Mom, where have you been?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, ça ? Maman, t'étais où ?

translation.en: Miss Mable burned our dinner, fell asleep and just keeps farting.
translation.fr: Mlle Mabel a brûlé notre dîner, elle dort et elle fait que péter.

translation.en: Kevin and Lindsey, this is Mr. Persons. He was nice enough to give me a ride home.
translation.fr: Voici M. Persons. Il a eu la gentillesse de me ramener.

translation.en: What's he want, a reward?
You know what? I really better get out of here.
translation.fr: Il vaut mieux que j'y aille.

translation.en: Smart.
Hey, Nick? I don't mean to be a pest...
...but I was just wondering if you could give me a ride to work tomorrow.
translation.fr: Pourriez-vous me déposer au bureau, demain ?

translation.en: -Of course. -Oh, great. Thank you.
-See you tomorrow. -Bye.
Mom, do you know what time it is?
Excuse me, I'm the mother. Get in the house.
-Get in the house. -It's raining.
Nick, thank you so much for helping me these past couple days.
translation.fr: Merci beaucoup de m'avoir dépannée, ces derniers jours.

translation.en: -You are so sweet. -Yeah, I know.
Hey, does this seem ripe to you?
I don't know. I don't eat food unless it has an expiration date on it.
translation.fr: J'en sais rien. Je mange rien sans date d'expiration.

translation.en: Nick, you are funny. You eat worse than my 7-year-old son.
translation.fr: Tu es drôle. Tu manges plus mal que mon fils de 7 ans.

translation.en: You kind of dress like him too.
What's wrong with that?
And do you know I have never seen you without a hat?
translation.fr: Je ne t'ai jamais vu sans casquette.

translation.en: -You don't need to see me without it. -Let me see.
translation.fr: Laisse tomber. Y a quoi, là-dessous ?

translation.en: -What's under there? -What?
-Come on, Nick. -Watch out. Get back. Hold on.
-Get back. -Give me that.
Hang on. Don't move.
-Nick, wait. -Right.
-Wanna go to my apartment? -No, I can't. I can't.
translation.fr: Tu veux aller chez moi ? Non, je ne peux pas.

translation.en: I've thought about it. I really have. But let's be realistic. I'm a single mom.
translation.fr: J'y ai pensé. Soyons réalistes : je suis une mère célibataire.

translation.en: No, you're a sexy mama.
translation.fr: Non, tu es une maman canon.

translation.en: Do you know this whole time we've been hanging out...
...you've never once asked me about my kids?
translation.fr: tu n'as jamais parlé de mes enfants.

translation.en: -How they doing? -I bet you don't remember their names.
translation.fr: Comment vont-ils ? Tu as oublié leur prénom.

translation.en: Rudy and Theo?
I think we should just be friends.
Next point wins. Let's go.
Hold on to your earrings there, Yao Bling...
...because I'm gonna embarrass you. And it's gonna hurt because I love you.
translation.fr: Je vais t'allumer. Ça va faire mal, vu que je t'aime.

translation.en: -Give me that. -Hey, that's a foul.
translation.fr: - Donne. - Faute. Tu m'as touché la main.

translation.en: Game time.
Get off of me, Lurch. That was a moving pick.
Let's run it again. Same teams. Come on.
No. I gotta go, y'all.
What? We're tied. Somebody has to lose.
translation.fr: Egalité. Faut un perdant, en Amérique.

translation.en: -It's the American way. -Hey, somebody did lose.
translation.fr: Faut un perdant, en Amérique. Y a un perdant. Tu sais que j'ai un truc à faire.

translation.en: -You know I gotta go do that thing. -What thing? What?
translation.fr: Y a un perdant. Tu sais que j'ai un truc à faire. Quel truc ?

translation.en: You know, I gotta take Suzanne to the airport in the morning.
translation.fr: Je dois déposer Suzanne à l'aéroport.

translation.en: Take Suzanne to the airport in the morning.
-You are stuck in the friend zone. -Get out of here.
translation.fr: Tu rames dans la zone de l'amitié !

translation.en: Listen to me. We've been friends a very long time...
translation.fr: Ecoute-moi. On est de vieux potes.

translation.en: ...and I am telling you, you gotta dump this girl.
-What? We not even going out. -That's the point, Nick.
translation.fr: On sort pas ensemble ! Quel que soit votre truc pas encore fait, faut que ça cesse.

translation.en: Whatever it is you don't have going on, it has got to end.
translation.fr: Quel que soit votre truc pas encore fait, faut que ça cesse.

translation.en: Okay, for all those who listen to this clown... ...Nick Persons will never be in the friend zone.
translation.fr: Aux auditeurs de ce charlot : Nick est hors zone de l'amitié.

translation.en: -Understand that and believe that. -Friend zone. Friend zone.
-Don't say I didn't warn you. -Friend zone.
-Here you go. -Oh, Nick, thank you so much. You are such a great friend.
translation.fr: Merci infiniment. Tu es un véritable ami.

translation.en: The friend zone is for losers only.
translation.fr: La zone de l'amitié est réservée aux losers.

translation.en: Please unload your friend and get on with your life.
translation.fr: Larguez votre amie et vivez votre vie.

translation.en: -Well, wish me luck. -Good luck.
Thanks for everything, Nick.
Suzanne, can I talk to you real quick?
translation.fr: Je peux te parler une seconde ?

translation.en: Sure.
You know, what we got going-- I mean, we don't really have something--
translation.fr: Ce truc, entre nous... Enfin, y a pas vraiment un truc.

translation.en: I don't really know what to call this... -Hang on. -...but it seems kind of....
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment appeler ça, mais je...

translation.en: Just one sec.
Well, when did that happen?
Well, actually, I'm already at the airport.
-Hey. You can't park here. -I know.
translation.fr: Stationnement interdit ! Mon amie est en ligne. Elle en a pour une seconde.

translation.en: My friend's making a call. She'll be off in a second.
translation.fr: Mon amie est en ligne. Elle en a pour une seconde.

translation.en: -Gonna be an expensive call. -I'm right here.
translation.fr: - Cet appel va lui coûter cher. - Mais je suis là !

translation.en: That's why you're getting a ticket.
They're expecting to spend New Year's Eve with you.
translation.fr: Ils pensent passer le nouvel an avec toi.

translation.en: Oh, don't-- Don't even go there with me, Frank.
You haven't spent five minutes with your kids since Labor Day.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas passé 5 mn avec eux depuis la rentrée.

translation.en: Frank, you know what? I am so sick of this.
Know what? That lady's got enough problems.
-I'm not going. -What's the matter?
My ex is sick, and he's not gonna pick up the kids.
translation.fr: Mon ex est malade. Il ne prend pas les enfants.

translation.en: -What about the babysitter? -She's leaving for Las Vegas...
translation.fr: Et la baby-sitter ? Mlle Mabel va à Las Vegas avec sa paroisse.

translation.en: -...with her church group. -Oh, no.
translation.fr: Mlle Mabel va à Las Vegas avec sa paroisse.

translation.en: You know, my kids miss him so much... ...and all he ever does is pull the rug out right from under them.
translation.fr: Mes enfants veulent le voir, et il leur pose un lapin.

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my job.
What if I bring them?
I couldn't ask you to do that. That's too much.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas te demander ça.

translation.en: Why not? Look, it's no big deal. Serious.
-Really? -Positive.
-Are you sure? -I wanna help you on this.
translation.fr: Tu es sûr ? Je veux t'aider.

translation.en: Nick, this is huge.
Thank you so much.
You are a lifesaver.
Okay, so I'll get the three tickets, and as soon as you guys land, call me.
translation.fr: J'achète les 3 billets. Dès que vous avez atterri, tu m'appelles.

translation.en: Oh, no, I meant that I'll drop them off at the airport.
translation.fr: Je parlais de les déposer à l'aéroport.

translation.en: Oh, no. You can't expect the kids to travel alone, Nick.
translation.fr: Tu n'imagines pas qu'ils vont voyager seuls.

translation.en: Kevin's got asthma. That recycled air in the plane-- I mean, yuck.
translation.fr: Kevin est asthmatique, et avec l'air conditionné de l'avion...

translation.en: But it'd be fine. Kids fly all the time.
translation.fr: Des tas d'enfants voyagent comme ça.

translation.en: It's nothing. I'll make sure they get on the plane.
They'll get milk and cookies, little plastic wings, get to meet the pilot.
translation.fr: Ils auront du lait, des gâteaux et rencontreront le pilote.

translation.en: You know, it'd be real cool.
Especially with me sitting next to them making sure everything is all right.
translation.fr: Comme je serai là pour veiller sur eux.

translation.en: Oh, how could I ever repay you?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment te remercier !

translation.en: Obviously, you don't care that she's using you.
translation.fr: Tu te moques qu'elle se serve de toi.

translation.en: But ask yourself this:
Would you trust a woman who'd trust you with her kids?
translation.fr: tu ferais confiance à une femme qui te confie ses enfants ?

translation.en: I'm tempted to call Child Services right now.
Uncle Nick loves kids.
Big lummox. Might as well just put myself on eBay.
translation.fr: Gros cinglé. Je vais me brader sur eBay.

translation.en: Hello. I'm here to pick up the kids.
Now, that's what I'm talking about.
What you wasting your time with Miss Suzanne for?
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous perdez votre temps avec Mlle Suzanne ?

translation.en: -Excuse me? -You come with me.
Miss Mable will take you on a guided tour to Sin City.
translation.fr: Mlle Mabel vous guidera au cœur de la luxure.

translation.en: Hello? Somebody?
Who wants to go to Vancouver?
Mom says that we should be polite.
translation.fr: Maman dit qu'on doit être polis.

translation.en: Now, kids, I know you're disappointed about your father...
translation.fr: Je sais que vous êtes déçus, pour votre père.

translation.en: ...but you're going to have fun.
Aren't you?
-Yes, Miss Mable. -Yes, Miss Mable.
Hey, did you bring us a gift?
translation.fr: Tu nous as apporté un cadeau ?

translation.en: Yeah, Mom's man friends always bring us presents.
translation.fr: Les copains de maman nous donnent toujours un truc.

translation.en: Oh, of course.
What kind of guy you think I am? Uncle Nick loves kids.
translation.fr: Vous me prenez pour qui ? Oncle Nick adore les enfants.

translation.en: As a matter of fact.... Look, look, look.
Dr. Munchies pizza coupon.
translation.fr: Bon de réduction chez Dr Munchies.

translation.en: You get a free liter of soda with any purchase of a large pepperoni.
translation.fr: Un litre de soda offert pour l'achat d'une giga pepperoni.

translation.en: -What's a liter? -Oh, yeah, and for you....
translation.fr: - C'est quoi, un litre ? - Et pour toi...

translation.en: -Look at that. Corkscrew. -Cool.
-Hey, it's got a knife. -You can't give him that.
translation.fr: - Y a un couteau ! - Faut pas lui donner ça.

translation.en: -Shut up. -Make me.
I don't make trash. I bury it.
-Well, I'll bury my foot in your-- -Say it. You're too scared to say it.
translation.fr: - Mon pied va toucher ton... - Dis-le. T'as la trouille de le dire.

translation.en: Be quiet, you paranoid dunce.
-Chicken. -Stop it. Stop it.
Hey, wanna learn some Chinese?
Sure. What you got?
Sensei says, "The first one is always a decoy."
translation.fr: Sensei dit que le premier est toujours un piège.

translation.en: Shotgun!
That's my seat. You stop.
They gonna eat you alive.
translation.fr: Ils vont vous manger tout cru !

translation.en: Hey! Watch the paint.
Okay, now, once we get in this terminal... ...I want everybody sticking together.
translation.fr: Une fois dans le terminal, je veux qu'on reste groupés.

translation.en: Now, be careful opening that door.
-Sorry, Nick. -Oh, damn!
-Boy, didn't you hear what I just said? -You swore.
translation.fr: - T'as pas entendu ce que j'ai dit ? - T'as dit un gros mot.

translation.en: You damn right I swore. That's about $400 worth of damage to my new car.
translation.fr: Putain, ça va me coûter dans les 400 $ !

translation.en: That's twice. Now you have to put $2 in the swear jar.
translation.fr: Deux fois. Tu dois mettre 2 $ dans la boîte à gros mots.

translation.en: Yeah, well, he gotta put about $400 in my pocket. -You got $400 for me? -No.
translation.fr: Il doit mettre 400 $ dans ma poche. T'as 400 $ ?

translation.en: And I want it cash.
Okay, man, no tears, all right? I won't change diapers out here.
translation.fr: On pleure pas, ok ? Je change pas les couches.

translation.en: Real good. Have you ever thought of being a youth pastor or a therapist?
translation.fr: Bravo ! Tu devrais faire mono, ou thérapeute.

translation.en: Look, it ain't like I said I was gonna take off my belt.
translation.fr: J'ai pas menacé d'enlever ma ceinture.

translation.en: He's gonna beat me, Lindsey! Save me!
-Little dude. Kevin. Come here. -Get away!
Is there a problem here, sir?
Just a little game I'm playing with the kids.
Boy, bring your butt back here!
Look, I got money. Check it out.
Will that shut you up, huh?
translation.fr: Ça va te faire taire, hein ? Tiens.

translation.en: Here you go. Ten bucks. Come on.
translation.fr: Ça va te faire taire, hein ? Tiens. 10 $, allez.

translation.en: Hey, you can't buy us off. Apologize.
translation.fr: Tu peux pas nous acheter. Excuse-toi.

translation.en: No, no. We're cool.
Yeah. We cool, little mama.
Plus, there's enough to go around. Got a ten-spot for you too.
translation.fr: Il y en a pour tout le monde. 10 $, pour toi aussi.

translation.en: I do believe I'm older than him.
translation.fr: Je suis plus vieille que lui.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm getting hustled by a couple of gangsters. Here.
translation.fr: Je me fais racketter par une bande de voyous.

translation.en: Now, hurry up. We can't be late.
translation.fr: On se bouge. Faut pas être en retard.

translation.en: When we go through, they can see our bones and innards?
translation.fr: Ils peuvent voir nos os et nos boyaux ?

translation.en: -No, fool, that's an x-ray. -Wrong answer.
translation.fr: Idiot, c'est des rayons X. Faux. C'est un détecteur de métaux.

translation.en: It's a metal detector.
translation.fr: Faux. C'est un détecteur de métaux.

translation.en: Oh, to see if you have any bombs?
translation.fr: Pour voir si on a une bombe ?

translation.en: You're not allowed to say "bombs" here.
-Why can't you say "bomb"? -Please remove all metal objects.
translation.fr: Pourquoi on dit pas bombe ? Enlevez tout objet métallique. Clés, monnaie, portable, bijoux.

translation.en: Keys, loose change, cell phones, jewelry.
translation.fr: Enlevez tout objet métallique. Clés, monnaie, portable, bijoux.

Make it quick.
Hey, how you guys doing? You all right?
I knew you'd come back. Lindsey didn't think so, but I did.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu reviendrais. Lindsey me croyait pas.

translation.en: Boy, you know I'm gonna be your friend always, right?
translation.fr: On est copains pour toujours, tu le sais ?

translation.en: But Mama's not gonna date you anymore.
translation.fr: Maman ne veut plus te voir.

translation.en: Listen, you guys.
Up here.
Your mother is a very, very wonderful lady.
translation.fr: Votre mère est une femme formidable.

translation.en: And she's gonna be dating guys that are much better than me.
translation.fr: Elle va trouver des hommes bien mieux que moi.

translation.en: So you guys gotta stop chasing them off, okay?
translation.fr: Il faut arrêter de les faire fuir, ok ?

translation.en: And stay away from their cars.
Unless they're bulletproof.
How do I know we'll ever see you again?
I got something for you.
I want you to hold on to my man Satch, okay?
translation.fr: Je veux que tu t'occupes de mon pote Satch, ok ?

translation.en: That's until I see you again.
...I gotta get going.
Do you have to?
Yeah, little man, I think so.
Look, I got one more thing for you.
translation.fr: J'ai encore un truc pour vous.

translation.en: There you go.
And for you.
Now you have blingage.
I love you guys.
Suzanne, I'm sorry about what happened today. I really am.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé de ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: I just wanna know if we can still be friends.
Nick, I don't think that's gonna happen.
We can't be friends...
translation.fr: On ne peut pas être amis...

translation.en: ...because I wanna be so much more than just your friend.
translation.fr: parce que je veux être beaucoup plus que ça.

translation.en: It's New Year's. Aren't you supposed to kiss her?
translation.fr: On est le 1er janvier. Tu dois l'embrasser, non ?

translation.en: I love a happy ending.
translation.fr: J'aime les histoires qui finissent bien.
